PHP_Invoker 1.1
===============

This is the list of changes for the PHP_Invoker 1.1 release series.

PHP_Invoker 1.1.3
-----------------

* No changes.

PHP_Invoker 1.1.2
-----------------

* No changes.

PHP_Invoker 1.1.1
-----------------

* No changes.

PHP_Invoker 1.1.0
-----------------

* `PHP_Invoker_TimeoutException` now holds information on the timeout.
